maqras.text: Kare wa haka no naka no mono ga abaki dasa reru toki no koto o shiranai no ka
Mata mune no naka ni aru mono ga, bakuro sa reru no o
Hontōni omo wa, sonohi, kare-ra ni tsuite subete shitte ora reru
Osore ononoku hi (Saigonoshinpan)
osore ononoku hi to wa nani ka
Osore ononoku hi ga, nanidearu ka o anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
(Soreha) ningen ga hisan suru ga no yō ni naru hi
Mata yamayama ga, suka reta yōmō no yō ni naru (Ni~Tsudearu)
Sore de, kare no hakari ga (zenkō de) omoi mono wa
kōfuku de michitarite kurasudearou
Daga hakari no karui mono wa
naraku ga, kare no satodearou
Sore ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
(Soreha) shōnetsu (jigoku) no hi
Anata gata wa (zaisan ya musuko nado no) ōi koto o hariatte, utsutsuwonukasu
Haka ni oitate rareru made mo
Iya, yagate (shigo) anata gata wa (sono shinjitsu o) shirou
Mōichido iou ka, iya, yagate anata gata wa shirou
Iya, anata gata wa (ima ni) hakkiri shiruto yoi nodearu
Anata gata wa kanarazu goku hi o miyou
Sonotoki anata gata wa sore o meikaku ni me de miru kotodearou
Sonohi anata gata wa,(utsutsuwonukashite ita) kyōraku ni tsuite, kanarazu towa rerudearou
Jikan ni kakete (chikau)
Hontōni ningen wa, sōshitsu no naka ni iru
Shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimi, tagaini shinri o susume ai, mata nintai o susume au-sha-tachi no soto wa
Wazawai naru ka na, subete no waruguchi o itte chūshō suru mono
Zai o atsumete keisan suru (no ni yonen no nai)-sha
Hontōni sono zai ga, kare o towa ni ikasu to kangaete iru
Danjite sōde wanai. Kare wa kanarazu gōka no naka ni, nagekoma reru
Gōka ga, nanidearu ka o anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
(Soreha) bōbō to moete iru arrā no hi
shinzō o yaki tsukushi
kare-ra no zujō ni kanzen ni ōikabusari
(nogareru koto no dekinai) retchū no naka ni
Anata no omo ga, zō no nakama ni, dō taisho nasa reta ka, shiranakatta no ka
Kare wa, kare-ra no keiryaku o kaimetsu sa se raretade wanai ka
Kare-ra no ue ni mure nasu amata no tori o tsukawasa re
yaki tsuchi no tsubute o nagetsuke sasete
kuiarasa reta wara kuzu no yō ni nasa reta
Kuraishu-zoku no hogo no tame
fuyu to natsu no kare-ra no taishō no hogo no tame,(sono arrā no onmegumi no tame ni)
kare-ra ni, kono Sei-dono no omo ni tsukae saseyo
Ue ni saishite wa, kare-ra ni shokumotsu o atae, mata osore ni saishite wa, sore o nozoki kokoro o yasuraka ni shite kudasaru okata ni
Anata wa, shinpan o usodearu to suru mono o mita ka
Kare wa, minashigo ni tearaku suru monodeari
mata hinja ni shokumotsu o ataeru koto o susumenai monodearu
Wazawai naru ka na, reihai suru monodearinagara
jibun no reihai o yurugase ni suru mono
(Hito ni) mi rareru tame no reihai o shi
jizen o kotowaru mono ni
Hontōni ware wa, anata (muhanmado) ni juntaku o sazuketa
Sā, anata no omo ni reihai shi, gisei o bō-ge nasai
Hontōni anata o zōo suru mono koso,(shōrai no kibō o) tata rerudearou
Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Ō fushin-sha-tachi yo
watashi wa, anata gata ga agameru mono o agamenai
Anata gata wa, watashi ga agameru mono o, agameru-sha-tachide wanai
Watashi wa, anata gata ga agamete kita mono no, sūhai-shade wanai
Anata gata wa, watashi ga agamete kita mono no, sūhai-shade wanai
Anata gata ni wa, anata gata no shūkyō ga ari, watashi ni wa, watashi no shūkyō ga aru nodearu
Arrā no enjo to shōri ga kite
hitobito ga mure o nashite arrā no oshie (isurāmu) ni hairu no o mitara
anata no omo no eikō o home tatae, mata o yurushi o koe. Hontōni kare wa, tabitabi yurusa reru okatadearu
Abū rahabu no ryōte wa horobi, kare mo horobite shimae
Kare no tomi mo mōketa kin mo, kare no tame ni yakudachi wa shinai
Yagate kare wa, moesakaru honō no gōka no naka de yaka reyou
Kare no tsuma wa sono maki o hakobu
kubi ni shuro no aranawa kakete
Ie,`kare wa arrā, yuiitsunaru okata de ara reru
Arrā wa, jison sa re
o umi nasaranaishi, osanre ni nara reta node wanai
kare ni kurabe eru, nanimono mo nai
Ie,`reimei no omo ni go kago o koinegau
Kare ga tsukura reru mono no waru (sainan) kara
fukamaru yoru no yami no waru (kigai) kara
musubime ni iki o fukikakeru (yōjutsu tsukai no) on'na-tachi no aku kara
mata, shitto suru mono no shitto no waru (saiyaku) kara
Ie,`go kago o koinegau, ningen no shu
ningen no ō
ningen'nokami ni
Kossori to shinobikomi, sasayaku mono no aku kara
Sore ga ningen no mune ni sasayaki kakeru
Jin (kasoke Tadashi)dearou to, ningendearou to
